text: Got an SMS saying my Mashreq account will be blocked unless I click a link. Feels like a scam?
Anyone else receiving fake Mashreq messages asking to verify account details?
Warning: I got a suspicious Mashreq SMS with a shortened link. Don’t click!
Is Mashreq sending WhatsApp messages now? Got one asking to update my info.
Received a call claiming to be Mashreq support asking for OTP. Sounded suspicious.
Multiple people in my office got fake Mashreq SMS alerts today.
Are these ‘account suspension’ messages legit or a phishing attempt?
Scam alert: fake Mashreq link asking for card details.
Why are there so many scam messages pretending to be Mashreq today?
Almost clicked a Mashreq SMS link before realizing it looked fake.
Seeing reports of phishing scams using Mashreq’s name.
Got an email saying urgent action required on my Mashreq account. Is it real?
Public reminder: Mashreq never asks for OTPs over SMS or calls.
Mashreq app not letting me log in since morning.
Anyone else facing delays in salary credit today?
Mashreq mobile app keeps timing out during login.
Is Mashreq experiencing technical issues today?
Unable to complete transfers via Mashreq app.
Login issues started after the latest Mashreq app update.
Card payment declined twice even though balance is sufficient.
Mashreq app seems slow today. Anyone else?
Having trouble accessing Mashreq online banking.
Transaction stuck in pending state for over an hour.
Hope Mashreq resolves the app issues soon.
Seems like a temporary outage? Things just started working again.
Hearing whispers that Mashreq might be acquiring a local crypto exchange soon. Anyone else heard this?
Rumor has it Mashreq is planning to phase out physical debit cards entirely by Q4 2026. Digital only?
Forwarded: Mashreq to launch 'Zero-Fee' international transfers for all Gold members starting Feb 1st. True?
Is it true that the new 'Agentic AI' feature will replace human support completely? That sounds risky.
Seeing chatter about a massive UI overhaul for the Mashreq app coming next week. Finally?
Heard a rumour that Mashreq will start accepting Digital Dirham for loan repayments.
My cousin at the bank says they are testing 'Palm Vein' scanners for ATMs. No more cards needed?
Word on the street is Mashreq is merging with a European neobank to expand into the EU.
Is Mashreq really going to charge for API access for third-party budgeting apps? That would suck.
Rumors of a data leak at a third-party vendor used by Mashreq. Hope it's fake news.
They say Mashreq Neo accounts will get free Netflix subscriptions soon. Too good to be true?
Heard talk of a 'Mashreq Metaverse' branch opening where you can meet advisors in VR.
Is the CEO stepping down? Saw some vague tweets about leadership changes.
Rumour: Credit card limits are being slashed across the board for expats next month.
Don't update the app! Rumour says the new version drains battery like crazy.
People saying Mashreq is launching a metal card for standard accounts. Big if true.
Are they really removing the SMS OTP option? I heard it's app-only authentication from March.
Rumour alert: 5% cashback on all EV charging payments coming to Mashreq cards.
Heard Mashreq might partner with Tesla for auto-financing directly in the app.
Is it true they are closing the downtown branch? Saw some moving trucks there.
CBUAE announces successful pilot of cross-border Digital Dirham transactions with India.
Global banking giant suffers massive cyberattack; SWIFT warns member banks to stay alert.
Fed Chair hints at another rate cut in March 2026 as inflation drops below 2%.
European Central Bank rolls out 'Digital Euro' for retail use across the EU today.
Saudi banks report record profits for 2025 driven by non-oil sector growth.
JPMorgan CEO warns of 'Agentic AI' risks in global financial markets.
Breaking: UK introduces strict new laws for refunding victims of APP fraud.
Goldman Sachs predicts Brent crude to stabilize at $75 through 2026.
IMF upgrades global growth forecast for 2026, citing resilient banking sectors.
HSBC completes sale of its German retail banking unit to Commerzbank.
Bitcoin surges past $120k as more banks integrate crypto custody services.
Singapore regulator fines three banks for lapses in anti-money laundering controls.
Standard Chartered launches first 'Net Zero' credit card made entirely from recycled ocean plastic.
China's central bank expands digital yuan pilot to cross-border tourism.
Apple and Goldman Sachs officially end their credit card partnership.
Visa introduces 'Palm Pay' biometric payments at 50,000 locations worldwide.
Report: AI-driven fraud cost global banks $50 billion in 2025.
Bank of America tests VR banking branches in the Metaverse.
Turkey's central bank raises interest rates again to combat persistent inflation.
Major Australian bank suffers outage leaving millions without access to funds.
Beware: Got a video call from 'Mashreq Support' but it was an AI deepfake. Scary stuff.
Fake email circulating about a 'mandatory EID update' for Mashreq. Link goes to a phishing site.
Scammers are using voice cloning now! My dad got a call that sounded exactly like me asking for money via Mashreq.
Watch out for ads on Insta offering 'Mashreq crypto investment' returns. It's a ponzi scheme.
Received a suspicious SMS: 'Your Mashreq Neo account is locked.' I don't even have a Neo account.
New fraud tactic: They send a small deposit to your Mashreq account then call claiming it was a mistake and ask for a refund.
Alert: People are getting fake courier messages asking for a small fee using Mashreq cards to steal data.
Mashreq facial recognition login is failing repeatedly today. Please fix!
Why does the Mashreq app chat bot keep saying 'System Unavailable' when I ask about loans?
Anyone else's Mashreq rewards points missing after the update?
Shoutout to Mashreq support for resolving my blocked card issue in 5 mins on a Friday!
ATM at City Centre swallowed my card. Customer service says 3 days to retrieve it.
Is the instant transfer feature down? My money hasn't reached the recipient.
Unable to download my e-statement from the Mashreq online portal. Button does nothing.
Finally got through to an agent after 20 mins on hold. Call volume must be high.
